Is it just me or did something really go wrong after the last svn update?
A=
 couple of days ago, the crawler was fast enough and I was crawling at leas=
t 3-5 links per second. But today, it is around 0.7. When I run a Java prof=
iler to see what was wrong, I can see that most of the CPU time is spent wi=
thin my custom processor's innerProcess(ProcessorURI) > GenericReplayCharSe=
quence.toString() > StringBuffer.append(CharSequence) > GenericReplayCharSe=
quence.charAt(int) > CharsetDecoder.decode(ByteBuffer)
here is a screenshot=
 from the profiler: http://files.getdropbox.com/u/1571029/profiler.jpg

and=
 here is how I use ReplayCharSequence in MySQLWriter.innerProcess(Processor=
URI uri) {
 ReplayCharSequence cs =3D null;
 try { 
   cs =3D uri.getRecord=
er().getReplayCharSequence();
   String myString =3D cs.toString();
   // s=
ome inner implementation
 } finally {
   //close cs.close(); //within try-c=
atch and all
 }
}

Am I missing something?
Appreciate any help!

Ikrom
